channel.title: Programme and News on Scottish 6 Days
channel.description: Recent content in Programme and News on Scottish 6 Days

item.title: General Information
item.description: Dogs The access agreement for Day 4 on Thursday 1st August 2019 is such that there must be absolutely NO DOGS even in cars at this Race. dog on leash Dogs are welcome on all other days in the event car parks in cars and on a lead. These are generally close to the assembly areas, except on Day 1, when it is not, then competitors can bring their dogs to assembly.
